panels.description: Memory used by each dataset troughout the pipeline.
panels.title: Dataset Memory Usage ($target)

panels.description: Total memory used by all datasets related to target $target
panels.title: Total Memory Used ($target)

panels.description: Total memory used by all datasets related to each target.
panels.title: Total Memory Used by Target

targets.rawSql:
select
 metrics.value as mae, tags.value as target
from
  metrics
join
  runs
on
  metrics.run_uuid=runs.run_uuid
join
  tags
on
  metrics.run_uuid=tags.run_uuid
where
  runs.status='FINISHED' and
  tags.key='pipeline_name' and
  metrics.key='MAE'

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  metrics.value AS metric,
  tags.value as target
FROM metrics, tags
WHERE
  metrics.run_uuid=tags.run_uuid and
  tags.key='pipeline_name' and
  metrics.key='MAE'

select
  mv.name, mv.version, mv.current_stage, metrics.value as mae
from
  model_versions as mv, metrics
where
  mv.run_id = metrics.run_uuid and
  metrics.key='MAE'
order by
  mv.name, mv.version

panels.description: Shape of the dataset used to train the model

targets.rawSql:
select
  params.key, params.value
from
  params, model_versions as mv, tags
where
  params.key like 'dataset.%' and
  params.run_uuid = mv.run_id and
  params.run_uuid = tags.run_uuid and
  mv.current_stage = 'Production' and
  tags.key = 'pipeline_name' and
  tags.value = '${target}'

panels.title: Dataset shape

panels.description: Parameters used by the pipeline to generate the $target model currently in production.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  params.key as parameter, params.value
from
  params, tags, model_versions as mv
where
  params.run_uuid=tags.run_uuid and
  params.run_uuid=mv.run_id and
  tags.key='pipeline_name' and
  mv.current_stage='Production' and
  tags.value='$target'
order by parameter

panels.title: Parameters

targets.rawSql:
select
  params.key, params.value
from
  params, model_versions as mv, tags
where
  params.key like 'target_column.%' and
  params.run_uuid = mv.run_id and
  params.run_uuid = tags.run_uuid and
  mv.current_stage = 'Production' and
  tags.key = 'pipeline_name' and
  tags.value = '${target}'
